installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo -e "设置Steam登录账户"
## 以防万一有人删除默认值.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "使用匿名用户.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "用户设置为 ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

rm -rf /mnt/server/*

echo -e "下载并安装steamcmd"
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL --fail -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://10.0.0.10/steamcmd.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server
rm steamcmd.tar.gz
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd


# SteamCMD 由于某种原因会失败，即使以root身份运行也是如此.
# 无论如何，这会在安装过程结束时更改。.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
echo -e "下载并安装服务端"
curl -sSL --fail -o Valheim_dedicated_server.tar.gz http://10.0.0.10/Valheim_dedicated_server.tar.gz
tar -xzvf Valheim_dedicated_server.tar.gz -C /mnt/server
mv /mnt/server/Valheim_dedicated_server/* /mnt/server/
rm -r /mnt/server/Valheim_dedicated_server
rm Valheim_dedicated_server.tar.gz

## 使用steamcmd安装游戏
echo -e "更新验证服务端"
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} +quit
## 设置32位库
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## 设置64位库
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

echo -e "下载安装BepInEx"
if ! api_response=$(curl -sfSL -H "accept: application/json" "https://thunderstore.io/api/experimental/package/denikson/BepInExPack_Valheim/"); then
        fatal "错误：无法从Thunderstore.io API检索 BepInEx版本信息"
fi

download_url=$(jq -r  ".latest.download_url" <<< "$api_response" )
version_number=$(jq -r  ".latest.version_number" <<< "$api_response" )
    
cd /mnt/server
# 设置超时时间为5秒，尝试从首选地址下载
curl -sSL --fail --connect-timeout 5 -O http://10.0.0.10/denikson-BepInExPack_Valheim-${version_number}.zip \
    && unzip -o denikson-BepInExPack_Valheim-${version_number}.zip \
    && cp -r /mnt/server/BepInExPack_Valheim/* /mnt/server \
    || (
        # 如果下载失败，等待1秒，然后使用备用地址
        sleep 1 \
        && curl -sSL --fail -O $download_url \
        && unzip -o denikson-BepInExPack_Valheim-${version_number}.zip \
        && cp -r /mnt/server/BepInExPack_Valheim/* /mnt/server
    )


echo "清理文件..."
rm -fR BepInEx/plugins/Valheim.DisplayBepInExInfo.dll
rm -fR changelog.txt
rm -fR start_game_bepinex.sh
rm -fR start_server_bepinex.sh
rm -fR CHANGELOG.md
rm -fR BepInExPack_Valheim
rm -fR icon.png
rm -fR denikson-BepInExPack_Valheim-*
rm -fR manifest.json
rm -fR README.md
rm -fR docker
rm -fR Valheim Dedicated Server Manual.pdf
rm -fR start_server.sh
rm -fR start_server_xterm.sh
rm -fR docker_start_server.sh

echo "安装完成-点击开始启动服务器【资源工坊】-https://www.aopk.cn"
